long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is open-source! Contribute at https://github.com/furybee/chrome-tab-modifier

- Rename your tabs with a click
- Change tab icons easily
- Pin your favorite tabs
- Group your tabs for better organization
- Prevent accidental tab closures
- Manage unique tabs
- Mute annoying tabs

Set your rules effortlessly from the Options page. Quickly rename a tab by right-clicking anywhere on the page and selecting "Rename Tab".

Check out the latest updates: https://github.com/furybee/chrome-tab-modifier/releases

About Permissions: Access to all websites is required for the extension to update each visited site. We do not store any of your data; your rules are saved on your computer.

Feel free to contact me on the GitHub project for any questions.
